## IConversationStore.leaveConversation() method

<b>Signature:</b>


## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  conversationId | <code>ConversationId</code> | Leave a conversation<!-- -->The conversation must be a room that the current user is a member of. |
